projects.title: Twilio Flex Automation
projects.description: I utilized Twilio Flex and Rest API calls to set up a custom plugin which operated a call center and directed nearly 10k calls based on the support specialist skills. Integrated Google SSO to keep track of skills with Google Admin. Updated SSL and DNS servers in the process.

projects.title: QueueCLA
projects.description: For our CS35L class, my groupmates and I created a resturant directory and queue system to avoid lines at popular on/off campus dining locations.

projects.title: Ilio Mirror Prototype
projects.description: After working on a smart mirror with a friend, I was hired by Ilio Mirror to create a production ready prototype to pitch to investors and film an industry grade commercial for Kickstarter.

projects.title: Taskway
projects.description: I PMed a platform that allowed local teenagers to work on a marketplace app. Built on PHP, Twilio API, and Stripe API. No framework since I wasn't cool enough to use one yet with my partners.

projects.title: Currently working on...
projects.description: I learned how to create an infinite seeded procedural generation map using perlin noise and some vector math. Currently working on a planet generation scheme to enhance this as of 6/13/2022.
